page.title: 20Shirley
page.content:
Shirley is a mainly residential area, with a large council estate.

There are several parks, the main one being St. James' Park, known commonly as the Rec.

There is a large rank of shops in Shirley High Street, including a few banks, various chain stores, many food shops and a few specialist shops, such as the tackle shop. There are also several public houses, and a police station.

In the centre of this area is Bellemore Boys School.

Along Winchester Rd. is a large cash & carry, two car retailers and a DIY centre.
